abstract: After 12 years, American Express is stepping back as the presenting sponsor of the festival in Lower Manhattan.
snippet: After 12 years, American Express is stepping back as the presenting sponsor of the festival in Lower Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — Come April 16, the stars will strut, paparazzi will pop, and fans will file into packed theaters, turning Lower Manhattan into a temporary film capital during the 13th annual Tribeca Film Festival. But they will not be having all that fun under the ubiquitous, blue-and-white corporate logo of American Express.

headline.main: AT&T, Not American Express, Will Be Chief Sponsor of Tribeca Film Festival
headline.print_headline: AT&T, Not American Express, Will Be Chief Sponsor of Tribeca Film Festival
